entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023
